#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define FIO ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0); cout.tie(0);

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long llu;

using namespace std;

int main() {
    FIO
    string aa="aa",bb="bb",ab="ab",ba="ba";
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,k;
        int craa,crbb,crab,crba;
        string caa1,cbb1,cab,cba,caa2,cbb2;
        craa = crbb = crab = crba = 0;
        cin>>n;
        k=n;
        while(k--)
        {
            string inp;
            cin>>inp;
            if(inp == aa)
                craa++;
            if(inp == bb)
                crbb++;
            if(inp == ab)
                crab++;
            if(inp == ba)
                crba++;
        }
        if(n==1)
        {
            if(craa)
                cout<<aa<<endl;
            if(crbb)
                cout<<bb<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        crab = (crab>crba)?crba:crab;
        crba = (crba>crab)?crab:crba;
        for(int i=0; i<craa/2; i++)
        {
            caa1+=aa;
            caa2+=aa;
        }
        for(int i=0; i<crbb/2; i++)
        {
            cbb1+=bb;
            cbb2+=bb;
        }
        for(int i=0; i<crab; i++)
        {
            cab+=ab;
            cba+=ba;
        }
        string ans;
        craa%=2; crbb%=2;
        ans += caa1+cab+cbb1;
        if(craa)
            ans+=aa;
        else if(crbb)
            ans+=bb;
        ans+=cbb2+cba+caa2;
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
